amendment.description: To allow a credit for distilled spirits wholesalers and for distilled spirits in control State bailment warehouses against income tax for the cost of carrying Federal excise taxes prior to the sale of the product bearing the tax.

vote.text: Amendment SA 646 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 646 proposed by Senator Grassley for Senator Bunning. (consideration: CR S6451-6456; text: CR S6454-6455) To allow a credit for distilled spirits wholesalers and for distilled spirits in control State bailment warehouses against income tax for the cost of carrying Federal excise taxes prior to the sale of the product bearing the tax.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 646 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 646 proposed by Senator Grassley for Senator Bunning.
